channel.title: profile on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in profile on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-15
item.description: Exclusive: Here’s a first look at some more upcoming features in Android 12 (12 minute read) The first Android 12 developer preview was released nearly two months ago.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-07
item.description: Microsoft Could Bring You Back From The Dead… As A Chat Bot (1 minute read) Microsoft has filed a patent for a method that would use social data such as images, voice data, social media posts, and other written media to build a profile of a person and create a chatbot with the personality of that person.
